page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: Adult Female The first thing I do when I wake up is to get dressed, then have breakfast which consists of cornflakes, toast, bacon and egg. Then at 9.00 pm I set off for work. I am a nanny and look after two children. I work full time from 9.00 am to 5.30 pm. Then I prepare my dinner. I am having Lasagne tonight. I usually have my dinner at about 6.00 pm. After I have had my dinner I watch a bit of television then I go out for a drink with my boyfriend. At night I am usually in bed by about 11.00 pm.
